Enumeration Type Documentation

enum D6MotionMode

Enumeration is used to specify the range of motions allowed for a DOF in a D6 joint. Registered as custom enumeration pJD6MotionMode.

Enumerator:
D6MM_Locked 

The DOF is locked, it does not allow relative motion.

D6MM_Limited 

The DOF is limited, it only allows motion within a specific range.

D6MM_Free 

The DOF is free and has its full range of motions.

enum D6DriveType

Enumeration is used to specify a particular drive method. i.e. Having a position based goal or a velocity based goal. Registered as custom enumeration pJD6DriveType.

Enumerator:
D6DT_Position 

Used to set a position goal when driving.

Note:
The appropriate target positions/orientations should be set.
D6DT_Velocity 

Used to set a velocity goal when driving.

Note:
The appropriate target velocities should beset.
enum D6MotionAxis

Enumeration is used to specify a particular degree of freedom.Registered as custom enumeration pJD6Axis.

Enumerator:
D6MA_Twist 

Rotational axis.

D6MA_Swing1 

Rotational axis.

D6MA_Swing2 

Rotational axis.

D6MA_X 

Linear axis.

D6MA_Y 

Linear axis.

D6MA_Z 

Linear axis.

enum D6LimitAxis

Enumeration is used to specify a particular axis for a soft limit. Registered as custom enumeration pJD6LimitAxis.

Enumerator:
D6LA_Linear 

Linear axis.

D6LA_Swing1 

Rotational axis.

D6LA_Swing2 

Rotational axis.

D6LA_TwistHigh 

Rotational axis.

D6LA_TwistLow 

Rotational axis.

enum D6DriveAxis

Enumeration is used to specify a particular axis for drives. Registered as custom enumeration pJD6DriveAxis.

Enumerator:
D6DA_Twist 

Rotational axis.Twist is defined as the rotation about the x-axis

D6DA_Swing 

Rotational axis.Swing is defined as the rotation of the x-axis with respect to the y- and z-axis.

D6DA_Slerp 

Rotational axis.

D6DA_X 

Linear axis = joint axis

D6DA_Y 

Linear axis = joint normal axis.

D6DA_Z 

Linear axis = x-axis cross y-axis.
